verses.content: Tisbe khuo, Gilead rama Tisbe khuoa mi Elija chun Ahab kuoma chun, “LALPA, a hmaa ka ngîrna hlak, Israelhai Pathien hring- na sâlin ka hril a nih; kum ieng zât amani sûng chu ka thu naw chun ruo le dâidaw tla hrim hrim naw nih,” a ta.
Chun, LALPA thu chu a kuomah a hung tlung a.
“Hitaka inthawk hi suok la, khawsak tieng panin fe la, Jordan bula um Kerith vadunga chun hang inbihmang rawh.
Chun, chu vadung tui chu tlân i ta, chutaka châwm ding chein vaâkhai thu ka pêk tah a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, a feh a, LALPA thu ang chun a thaw tah a; Jordan kâwla um Kerith vadunga chun a hang um tah a.
Chun, vaâkhai chun zîngkâr hin bei le sâ an hung putpêk hlak a; zântieng chun bei le sâ an hung putpêk nâwk hlak a, chun, vadung tui chu a tlân a.
Chun, a nakie deu chun hieng hi a hung na, chu rama chun ruo hrim hrim a sûr naw leiin vadung chu a hung kang tah a.
Chun, LALPA thu chu a kuomah a hung tlung a;
Tho la, Zidon rama Zarephath khuoah fe la, chutaka chun um rawh; ngai ta, a châwm ding chein hmeithai pakhat thu ka pêk tah,tiin.

Chuongchun, a tho a, Zarephath khuoa chun a fe tah a; chun, chu khaw kul kawtkhâr chu a va tlung chun, ngai ta, hmeithai pakhat thing inkhâwm hi a lo um a; ama chu a hang ko a, bêlin tui tlâwmte mi hung lapêk ta, hang dâwn ka tih,a ta.
Chun, la dinga a fe lai chu a hei ko a, bei khawm tlâwmte mi hung chawipêk ta, a ta.

Ama chun, LALPA i Pathien hringna sâlin ka hril a nih, bei chu chu ka nei nawh a, bêla beiphit vei- khat bak le, bûrah sahriek tlâwmte chau ka nei a; chun, ngai ta, ka feh a, kei le ka naupa ta dinga siemna dingin thingrieu pahni amani chau kân khâwm a na; chuongchun, chu chu fâng kan ta, kan thi el ding a nih,a ta.

Chun, Elija chun a kuomah, “Ṭi naw rawh, i hril ang chun va thaw phawt la, amiruokchu, chu chun bei chite bêk mi hung siempêk phawt la, chu chu mi hung chawipêk la, chu zoa chun i ta ding le i naupa ta ding chu i la siem ding annâwm.
LALPA Israelhai Pathien chun hieng ang hin a ti a nih, ‘LALPAIN hnuoi chunga hin ruo a hung insûrtir hmakhat chun bei phit bêl chu ruok chuong naw nih a, sahriek bûr khawm kang naw nih,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Elija hril ang chun a va thawh a, chun, ama le a sûnghai le Elija le chun ni iengzât lai sûng amanih an ring a.
Elija hmanga a hril LALPA thu ang khan, beiphit bêl chu a ruok chuong nawh a, sahriek bûr khawm chu a kang bawk nawh.
Chun, chuong thil hnunga chun in neitunu, hmeithai naupa chu a na tah a; a na chu a na hle el a; a thuok a tâwp tah a.
Chun, ama chun Elija kuomah, “Aw nang Pathien mi, nang le kei hi ieng am ei ni leh? Ka suolna inhriet- suoktir ding le ka naupa mi thatpêk dinga hung i ni hi tie!” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “I naupa chu mi hung pe ta,” a ta. Chuongchun, a pawm lai chu a lâk- pêk a, a umna pindana chun a hang pawm a, ama khuma chun ân zâltir a.
Chun, LALPA chu a ko a, “Aw LALPA ka Pathien, ka umna hmei- thainu chunga hin a naupa hi suk- hlumpêkin thil ṭha naw khawm i hung intlungtir a ni maw?” a ta.
Chuongchun, naupang chunga chun vawi thum a bawk a, LALPA chu a ko a, “Aw LALPA ka Pathien, lunginsiettakin hi naupang hringna hi amaa hin hung inumtir nâwk rawh,” a ta.
Chun, LALPAIN Elija thu chu a lo ngaipêk a, chuongchun, naupang hringna chu amaa chun a hung um nâwk a, a hung har nâwk tah a.
Elija chun naupang chu a ṭhuoi a, pindana inthawk chun in sûngah a fe thlâkpui a, a nu a pêk tah a; Elija chun, “En ta, i naupa hi a dam nâwk tah,” a ta.
Nuhmei chun Elija kuoma chun, “Tu zet hin chu Pathien mi i na, i baua LALPA thu hi thutak a nih ti ka hung hriet tah,” a ta.
